[IMPORTS]

[LOCATORS]
AppURL == testdata/Shinkansen/Discount.html
DepartDate == //*[@id="d-date"]
DepartTime == //*[@id="d-time"]
AgeUnder20 == //*[@id="under-20"]
Age20-60 == //*[@id="20-60"]
AgeOver60 == //*[@id="over-60"]
MemberYes == //*[@id="member-yes"]
MemberNo == //*[@id="member-no"]
CalculateButton == //*[@id="calculate-discount"]
TotalDiscunt == //*[@id="total-discount"]

[testcase1]
// load web
RELOAD, AppURL, null, null

// set date = 06/15/2023
null, DepartDate, 06/15/2023, null

// set time = 06:00
null, DepartTime, 06:00, null

// choose age 20-60
null, Age20-60, null, null

// choose member yes
null, MemberYes, null, null

// click calculate button
null, CalculateButton, null, null

// check total discount = 55%
null, TotalDiscunt, null, 55%
